channel.title: notebook on Ellen Xu
channel.description: Recent content in notebook on Ellen Xu

item.title: Wonder
item.description: Wonder + Humor such an interesting combination how to say – light-hearted or intense? scientific or fun-loving? rigorous or flamboyant? why not both? perhaps both are a way to poke & prod at the universe to have such a love for the world, happiness, & people Wonder + Humor
